en.title: **Freelance** Web Developer
en.text:
I worked as a Freelancer.

  • Developed full-stack web applications using Node.js, Next.js, and React.js.
  • Designed and implemented scalable backend systems and dynamic, responsive frontends.
  • Collaborated with clients to understand their requirements and delivered customized solutions.
  • Ensured code quality and maintained clean, efficient, and well-documented code.
  • Worked on projects ranging from small websites to more complex applications, adapting to diverse project needs.
